knimeNode.name: Projector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Projects one dimension of the image onto the other ones.

fullDescription.intro: Projects the selected dimension onto the remaining dimensions. Hence, the values of the selected will be summarized to just one value according to the chosen operation.
